Key Arguments: The proposed legislation is an attack on free speech, which is a fundamental right.
The bill is seen as a move towards totalitarianism, likening it to actions of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP).
Freedom of speech is paramount in a democratic society and should not be compromised.
Notable Quotes: It is an unacceptable attack of free speech which it a fundamental right of all Australian citizens.
Are you proposing to become another branch of the CCP?
Freedom of speech is paramount above all in a free and democratic society.
